mdRecord.dcterms:title: Local Government Officials Convention
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: From excerpt on back: Left to right: B.F. Dodson, President, League of Virginia Counties Association; C.E. Gnadt, President, Commissioners of Revenue Association; E.P. Gates, President, Commonwealth's Attorney's Association; C.B. Covington, Jr., President, Treasurer's Association; Lewis H. Vaden, President, Clerks Association; and University President Edgar F. Shannon Jr.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
